name: PromptGrow AI: AI Ideation & Validation Platform
description: PromptGrow AI is an AI assistant platform that supports the entire creative process from ideation to productization. It features five distinct modes optimized for different tasks—Normal, Brainstorming, Presentation, Competitor Research, and MVP—along with a real-time prompt improvement system and multimodal input (text and images) to help users enhance their AI interaction skills.
